column4: Actionparsnip, i want to clean my ubuntu - as i just installed it - how can i do this

sudo apt-get clean    you can also install bleachbit and run it as both user and root (claso as MANY apps as you can for maximum effeciveness as well as AVOID the options stating they will take a long time)
you can also remove apps you will never use from the install (ubuntu comes with a LOT of guff you wont need)
